attributes.action: Reject calls by The Archbishop of Canterbury for adoption of some aspects of Islamic Sharia law in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reject calls by The Archbishop of Canterbury for adoption of some aspects of Islamic Sharia law in the UK.  Suggesting that there should be variations for specific religious groups is wrong and extremely divisive. The law of the land should be applied irrespective of race, creed or religion. No exceptions.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
